name: Governing Law
desc: Must specify which state/country laws apply.

name: Termination
desc: Must allow termination for cause or breach.

name: Indemnification
desc: Must have an indemnification clause protecting parties.

name: Force Majeure
desc: Must excuse performance due to unforeseen events (Acts of God).

name: Assignment
desc: Must specify if assignment to third parties is allowed/restricted.

name: Intellectual Property
desc: Must clarify IP ownership (who owns created work).

name: Dispute Resolution
desc: Must specify arbitration, mediation, or litigation.

name: Payment Terms
desc: Must specify when payments are due (e.g., Net 30).

name: Liability Cap
desc: Should limit liability to a specific amount.

name: Non-Compete
desc: Check for restrictions on competing with the other party.

name: Non-Solicit
desc: Restriction on poaching employees or customers.

name: Severability
desc: If one part is invalid, the rest remains in effect.

name: Waiver
desc: Failure to enforce a right does not waive that right.
